tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION Dec. 6, 2021 at 10:30am EST At the #HAC meeting, attend "Declassification, Human Rights, and Historical Memory: #FRUS and the Argentina Declassification Project" To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov (1/3) https://t.co/klng3jC1cJ
